issue.title: Reset world makes Real Time negative

content.raw: Actually, it's only noticeable when Gazebo is paused for a significant amount of time. If you let gazebo sit paused for a while then un-pause and reset time, world or model poses, the Real Time indicator will count up from a negative number instead of zero.
content.html: Actually, it's only noticeable when Gazebo is paused for a significant amount of time. If you let gazebo sit paused for a while then un-pause and reset time, world or model poses, the Real Time indicator will count up from a negative number instead of zero.
